sql:
-- ============================================
-- TC-03: Project Sync with Git
-- ============================================
-- Prerequisites: run seed-test-cases.sh first
-- (creates sync_test_table and this job)
--
-- STEP 1: Create a project with source settings
--   (use the UI to set up git repo URL + credentials)
--
-- STEP 2: The sync_test_table has been pre-seeded.
--   Add a python UDF, kafka datasource, and additional
--   resources as needed.
-- ============================================

-- Pre-seeded table (already created by seed script):
-- CREATE TABLE sync_test_table (id INT, value STRING)
-- WITH ('connector' = 'datagen', 'rows-per-second' = '1');

SELECT * FROM sync_test_table;

-- ============================================
-- STEP 3: Push project to remote repo
--   EXPECTED: project synced to github
--
-- STEP 4: Delete project on SSB
--   EXPECTED: project and resources deleted
--
-- STEP 5: Create new project WITHOUT source settings
--
-- STEP 6: Update source settings with INVALID data
--   Try to push
--   EXPECTED: error message
--
-- STEP 7: Update source settings with VALID data
--   Import the previously pushed project
--   EXPECTED: project populated with previously pushed sources
-- ============================================
